title: matchmaking is rigged (READ)
body: I was in my promotion series for silver 5,  I was super hyped as I was on a winning streak with a winrate of 75% in my last 20 games,  First game I got an ashe who tanked every morgana q and fed tristana 8 kills by 5 minutes I shake it off get into q for my next match,  Me and vayne win our lane but our other lanes are losing so we group to see if we can win Well thery just breached our towers thats another loss right beforte the match ended  our orianna our teammate the great honor of calling us all a bunch of degenerate jews that need to be executed in front of a crowd So then my next match same thing happens me and ez win lane but then our yasuo tells me rammus and ezreal to hang ourselves while feeding a master yi,  Im finding this rigged,  I went on a  4 game losing streak onto a 3 game losing  with a 75% winrate as stated of above I know someone who is hard stuck s4 with an 80% winrate

replies.body: i played 400-500 (forgot what exactly just something between that) games with a 53% winrate and went from silver 3 to plat 3. Literally impossible to be hardstuck with a 51% or higher winrate. If you only have 100 games at 51% thats not hardstuck you just dont play enough.

no mate,  not impossible but very hard to do. if i win i only gain 16-18 lp but when i lose 21lp straight every single time. regardless if im on winning streak or losing streak; and that's not all. You get trolls and feeders, you don't always meet them but they are common. Common enough to ruin your climb. Sure someone like you can climb out of it, but someone like us who can't carry 4 people loses and stays behind but really if we have a team with the same skill level as us and someone that actually plays properly then I'm sure most of the people can climb out of sliver. League is based on team work, not individual skill. Even if you are the best in the world and your team is just doing random stuff and raging. It's not gonna help, the enemy team would much more advantage, and that is not fair. These type of stuff only happens in lower elo, because no cares about low elo. Filled with feeders and trolls, which holds everyone behind.

Being stuck anywhere with an 80% winrate is impossible, and rigging matchmaking is also a logical impossibility.

Not to mention riot would gain absolutely nothing via rigging matchmaking.

Accept you are bad and have a 50% winrate, maybe even try tracking every game instead of making it up.

Logical impossibility? Do you know what programming is? Do you know what it's capable of? Saying something like that I very much doubt you have any fucking clue what Riot could do with their team. Rigging matchmaking is VERY EASY for a team of skilled programmers, which Riot has access to by the way.

Riot would gain nothing? How about proving their bullshit statistics? Ever think of that buddy? Toxic players lose more games? That's funny because Reginald, Hashinshin, The Rain Man and multiple other high tier players were TOXIC AS FUCK and they WON MORE GAMES. I find it funny how after they released those stats that it became pretty much the truth, don't you? It would be very easy for Riot to not only rig matchmaking but rig in-game stats to give the "winning team" more damage. Your attack damage says its 150? Nah, it's actually 80 which is why you don't do any damage and you're getting shit on by the Lucian who's 2 levels behind with 3k less gold because he's on the "winning team".

I'm not saying that any of this is what's actually going on, but you're basically talking out of your ass with that "logical impossibility" horse shit. Remember, most Master and Challenger players are friends with Riot employee's and Riot only does soft resets so it's very easy for them to keep their ELO with a 49-51% win rate. Also, if Riot was rigging matchmaking it would be very easy for a Challenger player to call up one of the Employee's on this list and drop the name of the account he's going to be using / boosting to put himself on the "winning team" so they can say "See, look, he made it back to Challenger on a smurf so it's totally possible for ANYONE to do it if they're 'good enough'".
 
Use your brain bro. Riot makes money on this shit and they will do anything to make that cash, they don't give a fuck about the small players. When Tencent bought the company it was pretty much over.

Yes, i do. I am a developer with quite a lot of experience working with statistics and data structures.

It is mathematically impossible to have an average winrate that is not 50%, and that has utterly nothing to do with programming. Software cant violate reason and reality, no matter how complex it is.

All i see is you not understanding basic logic or mathematics, maybe you should go back to gradeschool, if that is even taught wherever you are from.

>  bullshit statistics?

You not liking them does not make them bullshit.

> That's funny because Reginald, Hashinshin, The Rain Man and multiple other high tier players were TOXIC AS FUCK and they WON MORE GAMES. 

False correlation, and you know it. Those are good players who happen to be toxic. Them being toxic does not mysteriously make them better.

Most toxic players tilt, and lose as a result. That is not even disputable.

So care to explain how it's mathematically not possible to rigg stuff like this? I mean, it's also a pretty rigged thing to say '33% more games are won when you are positive', when we all know that the winning side IS positive 9/10 times, while the losing side is tilting 9/10 times, let alone in this game.
 Their measurement on this statistic is rigged to the bone buddy. Not sure why you are even bothering to defend such thing.

Where are your facts exactly? Many have actually won and not because 'they are good'. 

> Yes, i do. I am a developer with quite a lot of experience working with statistics and data structures.

you would also know then that casinos their stuff is set to be RIGGED. So there IS a possibility to make stuff rigged, unless you are working with statistics which are full of crap and data structures that suck and have no logical reasoning behind them. 

You look rather like a person that has done a couple of tutorials on youtube. Next time give us some facts, because I am interested in why you think a game cannot make a win/lose system rigged, unless I am misunderstanding you?

One team wins, one team loses. Average winrate can never be anything except a perfect 50%. Anything else would require specific people to be singled out, which is illogical in a team game, not to mention making people lose does not benefit riot in any way; you cant buy success.

Of course you went completely off the deep end with this and launched a long and utterly irrelevant spew of personal attacks, so i dont feel a need to explain anything further to an angry reject.

List them then.
